roleset.name: emphasize

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: For 25 years , Xiamen has always upheld the concept of " stressing both development and preservation , with the economy and the environment both as winners , " seeking harmonious development of humanity and nature .
example.arg: with the economy and the environment both as winners

example.name: stress-v: transitive
example.text: In Syracuse , N.Y. , DyDee Service 's new marketing push stresses environmental awareness .

roleset.note: STRESS-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls butter-9.9. (from stress.01-v)

roleset.name: (cause to) experience stress, anxiety inducing, experiencing stress

example.name: ARG2
example.text: He also said I stressed him with the way I talk to him.
example.arg: with the way I talk to him.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: I I feel there 's sort of a a line to cross too between really planning it out and worry and stressing over it because for a while a couple months back there I was thinking in terms of oh gosh you know can we ever afford a house

example.name: stress-v: inanimate arg1
example.text: Winter weather, especially frigid temperatures like we have had recently, stressed the machinery to the maximum.
example.arg: Winter weather, especially frigid temperatures like we have had recently,

example.name: stressed-j: passive with arg3
example.text: He was stressed [*trace*] about the test.

example.name: stress-v: ergative with arg3
example.text: I I feel there 's sort of a a line to cross too between *PRO* really planning it out and worry and stressing over it ...

example.name: stress-v: with args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: She never stressed him about getting married until after they had their third child.
example.arg: until after they had their third child.

example.name: stressful-j
example.text: Or we may get back together , since she told me she might feel differently in the future . -LRB- ie , want me back , after a break that [*] 's less ' stressful ' ; not that we ever had a stressful time .. -RRB- .

roleset.note: STRESS-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home; adjectival 'stressful' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls marvel-31.3-2. (from stress.02-v)
STRESSFUL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from stressful.01-j)
STRESSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from stressed.02-j)

example.name: stress-v
example.text: The settlement was uneven (differential settling) which stressed the beams and columns designed by Datum, and resulted in cracking, spalling and breaking of the beams and columns.

example.name: stress-n
example.text: Having periods of rest after exercise or activity involving your elbow can relieve stress on the joint;

roleset.name: (cause to) experience stress (phrasal)

role.descr: subject matter of stress (stressed out about/over __)

example.name: ARG2
example.text: They say they 're sick of politics in general and stressed *trace*out by rifts caused by political differences.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: but I 'm changing my attitude to the point where I 'm not going to get stressed out about it too much .

example.name: stress_out-v: passive with arg3
example.text: but I 'm changing my attitude to the point where I 'm not going to get stressed out about it too much .

example.name: stress_out-v: ergative with arg3
example.text: I I feel there 's sort of a a line to cross too between *PRO* really planning it out and worry and stressing out over it ...

example.name: stress_out-v: with args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: I have never yelled at him or stressed him out about eating or not eating.

roleset.note: STRESS_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. See VNcls marvel-31.3-2. Basically the same as stress.02. (from stress.03-v)
STRESSED_OUT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from stressed.03-j)
